verses.roman:
ratir uvāca
bhavān nārāyaṇa-sutaḥ
śambareṇa hṛto gṛhāt
ahaṁ te 'dhikṛtā patnī
ratiḥ kāmo bhavān prabho

synonyms: ratiḥ uvāca—Rati said; bhavān—You; nārāyaṇa-suta h—the son of Lord Nārāyaṇa; śambareṇa—by Śambara; hṛtaḥ—stolen; gṛhāt—from Your home; aham—I; te—Your; adhikṛtā—legitimate; patnī—wife; ratiḥ—Rati; kāmaḥ—Cupid; bhavān—You; prabho—O master.
translation: Rati said: You are the son of Lord Nārāyaṇa and were kidnapped from Your parents' home by Śambara. I, Rati, am Your legitimate wife, O master, because You are Cupid.
